articles.title: US Secretary of State's SA visit start of a 'new chapter' after seven years of silence - News24
articles.description: United States Secretary of State Antony Blinken believes his strategic dialogue visit to South Africa is the start of a new chapter in efforts to strengthen economic ties between the two countries.
articles.content:
• US Secretary of State Antony Blinken started his Africa tour in South Africa. 
  • He held a strategic dialogue with Minister of International Relations and Cooperation, Naledi Pandor.
